Text: I cant speak to the legitimacy of this torrent, but I have this set and the alternate versions/cuts of the films are great, particularly the 3rd film. The original cut makes WAY more sense than the released one.

It's not downloading for me, help?

I want to punch the marketing douche in the face who said they should call it a Quadrilogy. Let's break it down, Quad-Ril-Ogy. The ril is from Tri which is three, not four or more. Trilogy rolls off the tongue but quadrilogy doesn't. It's a fucking Anthology after three and yet somehow this word is now a part of English.
